comments: Mrs.Bratton is the most amazing math teacher!! She is extremely patient & wants her students to succeed. I took her for 099 & math modeling & would take her for every subject if she taught it. I had been out of school for awhile when I started back with her & she helped me gave me the confidence to continue on in my college career.
She is very out there but she provides worksheets and help when you ask for it. She does not have good control of the class though and some students tend to take advantage of that.

Mrs. Bratton his a great math teacher. She has lots of patience. If you want to pass the compass, and a teacher who cares, I strongly encourage you to take her. Trust me... She even takes time out to show you how to use the calculator.

I wouldn\'t recommend her if you aren\'t strong in math. She expects you to remember every little detail you have learned from every math prior to this. Don\'t ask a question cause she will make you look dumb in front of thee class. She shows you how it\'s done in class but after that you\'re on your own. You pretty much teach yourself.
I don\'t like Ms. Bratton\'s teaching style at all. I had to teach myself and get a tutor for the class. She doesn\'t drop the lowest test grade like my 098 instructor did.

Ms. B is very nice and everything the students said she was, HOWEVER, if you are not good at algebra and do not already know how to do it, do not take her. She basically reviews the work but expects you to already know how to do it. Consider going into 098 or try a different teacher. Textbook not needed, just my math lab code and Casio fx-

Very helpful! I have always struggled to understand math but ever since her class I understand everything now.`She is an amazing teacher and I wish I could have had her for all my math classes. Take her class!

I didn\'t understand her style of teaching, felt like I was teaching myself and it actually worked! Frustrating at times but it dusted the cobwebs off my brain and actually had me applying myself! Just make sure you get the recommended calculator.
Mrs. Bratton is an extraordinary teacher. She goes to the lowest level to teach, she is soft spoken and compassionate, very helpful and go the extra mile to make sure you understand.
Ms. Bratton is a great teacher, she is very soft spoken though.(lol) She is always helpful and she makes you feel like you can do anything when it comes to math. I will give her an A+++
Ms Bratton is the best Math teacher in the world! My whole life I hated math, I feared it, always got bad grades, until I took her classes. She is amazing at teaching the material and very patient.

Mrs.Bratton makes math anxiety indivudals like myself be at ease and embrace math. It was a challenge for me, but she makes it simple and most importantly always available. With alot of hard work, I made an A. She made it possible for me to see math in a different light. She is superb. I always recommend her to other students.
LOVE HER, Love Her, love her! Extremely helpful and lovig!

Great teacher, really cares about students. Had been out of school for 25yrs. really took the time to make sure you understand the material. BONUS POINTS for perfect homework and in class participation. Makes learning math fun with all the"cook book"recipes. Take her class if you get the chance.
I really loved this teacher!!!!!! She is very nice and helpful! :)
I would describe her as nice-nasty, seems irritated when students ask for clarification
great teacher ! she makes sure you understand
AWESOME AWESOME!!! THE BEST MATH TEACHER EVER. I love MS.B she will explained till you get it and care about her students! I never did good in math till MS.B
I loved Mrs. Bratton, she is very clear and professional. Great teacher
I have always had phobia for math but Ms Bratton she built my confidence. Surprisingly i made an A in her class. Study your test review and you will be fine. Wish she could teach every class at GTC.
